attributes.action: Help the defenseless Rohingya ethnic group of Burma/Myanmar from state led massacres
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Prime minister,

As you would probably know that the worst form of ethnic cleansing and massacre is now taking place in Burma/Myanmar, lead by the state and security apparatus in that country supported by Budhist monks.

Please visit the websites below, which represents a tip of the iceberg in terms of what is really taking place there.

http://www.columnpk.com/muslim-massacre-in-myanmar-dr-asjad-bokhari

http://www.columnpk.com/muslim-massacre-in-myanmar-dr-asjad-bokhari//

This is a country that recently received high level western endorsements through lifting of sanctions, and visits by secretary of state: Hilary Clinton and Prime minister: David Cameron.

As a civilized nation, we have a moral duty to help these poor wretched and defenseless people.

I urge you to do something to help these people before it is too late to help.
